name: Forgotten Shrine Of The Slime Toad
name_original: Forgotten Shrine Of The Slime Toad
description:
Sticking from the mud in a remote swamp is a stone doorway. The stonework is ancient, chiseled from pale blue granite with a subtle bas relief of toad’s face above the door. Large wet webbed footprints lead into the dark opening. Croaking can be heard from inside. 

A half page adventure made for the Tunnel Goons analog adventure game but usable for any table top dungeon crawling adventure game!

This and other adventures are available for $2 a month at the Highland Paranormal Society Patreon.
